import React, {useState} from 'react'; import logo from './logoblob.png'; // consider taking away the blue background from this logo import './App.css'; function App() { const [timer, setTimer] = useState(0); const setValue = (value) => { setTimer(value); } return (

Welcome to Ppalli!

Your timer is set for every {timer} minutes.

Visit us
); } export default App;
